target: You're quite welcome! Have a wonderful day!
context: <user>  I'm looking for a particular restaurant. It's called hotel du vin and bistro. <system>  I have found the place you are looking for. It is located in the centre of town and has a moderate price range. Would you like the address? <user>  Yes, and please include the area and postcode. <system>  It is located at 15-19 Trumpington Street, postcode cb21qa, located within the city centre. Would you like me to book a reservation for you? <user>  Yes please. I am also looking for a train that leaves wednesday from birmingham new street as well if that's not too much trouble? <system>  There are trains departing from Birmingham New Street from 05:40 and every hour past that time. What time would you like to travel? <user>  I would like to arrive by 13:45 in Cambridge if possible. <system>  I have eight trains that will arrive by 13:45. What time would you like to depart?<user>  The earliest train is alright with me. <system>  Would you like me to book that for you?<user>  Yes, please, for one. And could you give me the reference number, please? <system>  I have booked at train leaving at 5:40 for you. The total cost will be 75.09 GBP and your reference number is DA1PDHXF . Is there anything else I can help with?<user>  That's everything that I needed. Thanks a lot for the assistance. <system>
